page.title: 20SCHOOLS contd
page.content: The extra activities at Nugent House are pool, table tennis,B.M.X. and outdoor pursuits like climbing and abseiling. At Garswood school there are 289 children and 12 teachers, it is a modern school, they have many clubs, badminton,netball,soccer,sketching, dog training,film,gymnastic,choir, music group and recorders. Gerard school has 63 children and 3 teachers and 1 part time. They have only the book club. The Rectory school has 248 children and 11 teachers, there are 9 classes. They have clubs for chess,table tennis,gymnastics,recorders and a woodwind group. The participating schools for this report were Garswood C.P. School, Billinge Chapel End C.P. School and Hamblett School ,St. Helen's.
